Package space.sunqian.fs.base.date

Interface DateFormatter

@Immutable public interface DateFormatter
Formatter for time and date. This formatter has a default zone information (zoneId()), which will be used when the object to be operated does not contain zone information. The implementation of this interface is immutable and thread-safe.

  • Method Details

    • defaultFormatter

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DateFormatter defaultFormatter()
      Returns the default DateFormatter of which pattern is DateKit.DEFAULT_PATTERN, and zone is ZoneId.systemDefault().
      Returns:
      the default DateFormatter of which pattern is DateKit.DEFAULT_PATTERN

    • ofFormatter

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DateFormatter ofFormatter(@Nonnull @Nonnull DateTimeFormatter formatter)
      Returns a new instance of DateFormatter based on the given DateTimeFormatter. The default zone info of the returned instance is ZoneId.systemDefault().

      The returned instance supports Date, Instant, LocalDateTime, ZonedDateTime, OffsetDateTime, LocalDate and LocalTime. But doesn't support pattern methods.

      Parameters:
      formatter - the given DateTimeFormatter
      Returns:
      a new instance of DateFormatter based on the given DateTimeFormatter

    • ofPattern

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DateFormatter ofPattern(@Nonnull @Nonnull String pattern) throws DateTimeException
      Returns a new instance of DateFormatter based on the given pattern. The default zone info of the returned instance is ZoneId.systemDefault().

      The returned instance supports Date, Instant, LocalDateTime, ZonedDateTime, OffsetDateTime, LocalDate and LocalTime. And its underlying formatter is from DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(String).

      Parameters:
      pattern - the given pattern
      Returns:
      a new instance of DateFormatter based on the given pattern
      Throws:
      DateTimeException - if the pattern is invalid

    • ofFormatter

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DateFormatter ofFormatter(@Nonnull @Nonnull DateTimeFormatter formatter, @Nonnull @Nonnull ZoneId zoneId)
      Returns a new instance of DateFormatter based on the given DateTimeFormatter.

      The returned instance supports Date, Instant, LocalDateTime, ZonedDateTime, OffsetDateTime, LocalDate and LocalTime. But doesn't support pattern methods.

      Parameters:
      formatter - the given DateTimeFormatter
      zoneId - the default zone info of the returned instance
      Returns:
      a new instance of DateFormatter based on the given DateTimeFormatter

    • ofPattern

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DateFormatter ofPattern(@Nonnull @Nonnull String pattern, @Nonnull @Nonnull ZoneId zoneId) throws DateTimeException

      Parameters:

      @Nullable default @Nullable String formatSafe(@Nullable @Nullable Date date) throws DateTimeException

      Parameters:
      date - the given date to format, can be null
      Returns:
      the formatted string, or null if the given date is null or an exception thrown
